name: Reviver (puvhvh007)
description:
Team Name

V-Rail

Gameplay Instructions

WASD movement, L Shift to sprint, Q to switch dimension, E to interact.

There are unlimited universes, right? It is indeed. You were chosen to try to interact with person from another universe. Who knows, who will your universe-twin be, maybe it's another version of you, or maybe even your brother, who died in accident 2 years ago? If it's your brother, can you revive him, bring him back to life? What are they even trying to achieve? And why do they need me?

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam.

SFX from WeLoveIndies;
Unreal engine marketplace content: Directional Gravity plugin, some Science Lab props, Stylized Rendering System, couple of animations from AdvancedLocomotionSystem. 

Link to Gameplay Footage

Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?

5.0.3
